class.name: SiONTrackEvent
class.description: Some events may not have a [SiMMLTrack] instance associated with them. In these cases data is provided by the sender. If there is a track, event data is taken from the track directly.

method.name: get_event_trigger_id
method.description: Returns the trigger ID of the event.

method.name: get_frame_trigger_delay
method.description: Returns the trigger delay in frames.

method.name: get_note
method.description: Returns the note involved in the event, if available.

method.name: get_track
method.description: Returns a reference to the [SiMMLTrack] instance involved in the event.
